entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 2:40 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
